sub_title: Internal Comms Manager | Employee Engagement Advocate | Empowering companies to build and run effective internal communications | Driving employee engagement through strategic storytelling and data-driven insights
summary:
I am a data analyst in the making. Having worked for years in Comms, Content, Public Affairs, and Marketing, I have found a passion in storytelling – especially in areas concerning business, the future of work, talent solutions, or HR. More still, I have learned that the best stories are told with and through data. That’s why I have decided to expand my skill set and take Google’s Data Analytics Certificate program – to marry my experience of storytelling with hard skills in data analysis. 

Gaining strong analytical and visualization skills and learning about relational databases, SQL, spreadsheets, R, and Tableau was for me the next logical step in being able to help companies make more sense of the ever-changing and unpredictable world.

[{'company': {'id': 18040206, 'name': 'Athlon International', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E0BAQFbB4lJRkQKkw/company-logo_400_400/0/1688371375191?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=aoShuE9cLGfjV_6pnhXrlpITYz9HisVZtiAxXEl_nBs', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/athloninternational/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Athlon International', 'description': 'Building Internal Communications: I am building an effective internal communications framework from scratch for the IT department, establishing clear channels and guidelines for information sharing.

Data-Driven Strategy: I utilize data to inform our communication strategies, ensuring messages are targeted and impactful. This involves analyzing communication metrics and employee feedback to refine our approach continuously.

Transformation Navigation: I am playing a crucial role in guiding the company through a major transformation. I craft clear and compelling messages to ensure all employees understand the change and their role in it.

Employee Engagement: I foster a culture of transparency and engagement within the IT department, promoting open dialogue and collaboration to ensure all team members feel valued.

Collaboration with IT and Leadership Teams: I work closely with IT leaders and the broader leadership team to align our internal communications with strategic objectives and corporate values, translating complex IT initiatives into accessible messages.', 'title': 'IT Internal Communications Manager | IT Strategy & Transformation', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Myself', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'company': 'Myself', 'description': None, 'title': 'Freelance Writer', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 10806989, 'name': 'AIHR | Academy to Innovate HR', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E0BAQG3TDK_JVSUpQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1688807466569?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=MjPQLfo5J4SaFsu49XX21SphNLnacGDmUOWJdCnBkAE', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/aihr/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Rotterdam, South Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'AIHR | Academy to Innovate HR', 'description': "My mission at AIHR was to help CHROs and HR professionals connect the dots between HR and broader trends in the world of work and elevate their role as being more strategic in organizations’ business decisions.
